abstract: Los Angeles County prosecutors say they will not bring charges against 15 Venice High School students accused of sex crimes against two under-age girls, due to lack of evidence; decision raises questions about Los Angeles Police Department's aggressive actions and arrests of the students in March.
lead_paragraph: Los Angeles County prosecutors said there was insufficient evidence to proceed with a case against Venice High School students who were arrested in March on accusations involving two under-age girls.

headline.main: No Charges for 15 Students in Sex Case
headline.print_headline: No Charges for 15 Students in Sex Case

snippet: Los Angeles County prosecutors said there was insufficient evidence to proceed with a case against Venice High School students who were arrested in March on accusations involving two under-age girls.
